Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's pretty impressive that the leviathan's
<clr:0000>eyes were fossilized too<clr:ffff>, right?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Wrong!
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>*sigh*<sp:5:1:0> And after I came all this way.<sp:5:0:0>
I wish I could have seen him with both of
<clr:0000>his cute little eyes<clr:ffff> still in his head.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>That <clr:0000>other eyeball<clr:ffff> has to be around here
somewhere, right?
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I could stay here staring all day...<sp:5:1:0>but
there's still two more leviathans to meet!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>I can hardly wait to see the next one.
But how to choose?<sp:0:4:0>Hmm... Maybe the wee <clr:0000>leviathan in Hebra<clr:ffff>
is feeling lonely.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Let me see your <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff>. I'll show you where
to find him.
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>He's supposed to be around
here somewhere.
Talk01: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>I had a feeling you'd turn up. Take a look!
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Eeeeee! I can see both of his little eyes!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>Oh, just look at him!<sp:5:1:0> That big, ferocious
face—those cute, round eyes...<sp:0:4:0>I'm not sure whether to cower in fear or
pat him on his adorable baby head!<sp:5:1:0>
He's not just complete, he's PERFECT!
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm not just on a journey across the land,
but a journey through time! <sp:5:0:0>I'm trying to
get my eyes on all the old stuff I can.
I wanted to see if they had anything like
that at the Akkala Ancient Tech Lab.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Buuut it seems like some weirdos took
the place over, so I'm pretty much at a
standstill here.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>You know...<sp:5:0:0>ancient things!<sp:5:0:0> Things that are
ancient! Oh, just one look at them and it's
like I've been transported through time.
That's the thrill I'm looking for. But what
should I go see next?<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>Oh, I've got it!<sp:5:0:0> Did you hear that they
found <clr:0000>fossils of giant leviathans<clr:ffff> that once
lived in this land? It's true!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>How many, you ask? Not one, not two,
but THREE giant fossils, just waiting for
me to say hello!
But which to meet first... Maybe I'll go
introduce myself to the <clr:0000>itty-bitty leviathan
in<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Eldin<clr:ffff>, to start.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Here, let me see your <clr:0000>map <clr:ffff>for a second.
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>What a shame.<sp:5:0:0> So the delights of history
are lost on you, then...<sp:5:1:0> Well, goodbye.
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Why, I'd pay a small fortune for a chance
like that!
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>Oh, hello there. Are you out on an
adventure too?
Near02: I wish I could see both...
Talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>Good evening. Are you out on an
adventure too?
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Oh, <sp:5:1:0>I can only imagine what he looks
like—how beautiful he must be!<sp:0:4:0>Why don't you pay him a visit as well?<sp:5:0:0>
I'm sure it will set your heart all aflutter!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>I'm too keyed up to stand around here.<sp:5:1:0>
Time to go make my dreams a reality!
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>Because look again—the left eyeball
is missing!
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>So you found his eye and put him back
together again? Thank you!<sp:0:4:0>Here, take this.<sp:5:0:0> It's the least I can do
after you made my historical dreams
come true!
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Oh,<sp:5:1:0> I just can't wait to see how cute the
little guy is!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>In fact, what am I waiting for?<sp:5:1:0> I'm off to
see him now! So long!
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>*sigh*<sp:5:1:0> It took so long to walk all the way
out here...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>I wish I could have seen him with <clr:0000>both
of his eyes in his head<clr:ffff>.
